description: Shimla, Manali, Kufri, Solang Valley, Kasol, Manikaran, Chandigarh
activities: Day 1: Arrival and sightseeing in Shimla
Day 2: Visit Kufri and Jakhoo Temple
Day 3: Travel to Manali, explore local market
Day 4: Solang Valley adventure activities
Day 5: Visit Kasol and Manikaran Sahib
Day 6: Travel to Chandigarh, Rock Garden tour
Day 7: Departure
instructions: Carry warm clothes, ID proof, and necessary medications

description: Srinagar, Gulmarg, Pahalgam, Sonmarg, Dal Lake
activities: Day 1: Arrival in Srinagar, Shikara ride on Dal Lake
Day 2: Explore Mughal Gardens and Shankaracharya Temple
Day 3: Visit Gulmarg, enjoy Gondola ride
Day 4: Drive to Pahalgam, explore Betaab Valley
Day 5: Trip to Sonmarg, enjoy Thajiwas Glacier trek
Day 6: Leisure day for shopping and local cuisine
Day 7: Departure
instructions: Carry warm clothes, ID proof, and cash for local purchases

description: Baga Beach, Anjuna, Dudhsagar Waterfalls, Fort Aguada
activities: Day 1: Arrival in Goa, evening at Baga Beach
Day 2: Explore Anjuna and Vagator beaches
Day 3: Visit Dudhsagar Waterfalls and spice plantation
Day 4: Sightseeing at Fort Aguada and Panjim city
Day 5: Departure
inclusions: Hotel stay, breakfast, bike rental, guide
instructions: Carry swimwear, sunscreen, and beach essentials

activities: Day 1: Arrival in Jaipur, visit Amber Fort
Day 2: Explore City Palace, Hawa Mahal, and Jantar Mantar
Day 3: Travel to Jodhpur, visit Mehrangarh Fort
Day 4: Explore Umaid Bhawan Palace, Mandore Gardens
Day 5: Travel to Udaipur, boat ride at Lake Pichola
Day 6: Visit City Palace, Jagdish Temple, and Fateh Sagar Lake
Day 7: Travel to Jaisalmer, explore sand dunes
Day 8: Camel safari and cultural night in Jaisalmer
Day 9: Departure
inclusions: Hotel stay, breakfast, transport, cultural shows
instructions: Carry light clothing, ID proof, and cash for shopping
